value.title: The wrong answers to 30 common Power BI interview questions 2022
value.excerpt: There are multiple websites that offer Power BI interview questions and answers and after reviewing them, I have collected 30 common Power BI interview questions that have wrong answers and together we will figure out what the right answer is.  Join me and lets clarify those topics once and for all!
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sVDd9fLyImM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Track all your social media channels EASILY in Power BI | Social media tracker template included 😊
value.excerpt: Track all your social media channels EASILY in Power BI | Social media tracker template included 😊  I finally was able to create a Power BI report to track all my social media accounts and not only I am going to share it with you, I will also show you how I created it so you can do it too.
